title: Dan Swimer • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #75
itunes:title: Dan Swimer • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #75
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the writer and behind the scenes developer - it’s DAVID SWIMER!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with behind the scenes comedy writer, heavy hitter and multiple hat wearer DAN SWIMER!


A super damn fine one this week folks, as Brett sits down with Dan to get down deep into the heart of this whole comedy and cinema malarkey. Between them, they cover a good amount of ground and it’s a lovely one to get to know Dan and his many ins and outs. From his co-writing with Simon Amstell in various form, to working with Brett a while back there, to being the ‘JD Sallinger of comedy”, the madness of standup comedy and processes therein, living in LA, Sacha Baron Cohen, being a bad car driver, field cults, the collateral damage of the ‘disturbing kid film’ genre, witches, Stallone, being a sensitive dad, the two ingredients to ensure tears, a round of applause for Emma Thompson, flight rules, his wife and a certain earlier film role, Uncle Joe’s big box o’ VHS tapes, and all manner of other greatness. ENJOY BRETT AND DAN!


UPCOMING SHOW @ THE BFI • DECEMBER 19th!


EPISODE LINKS:

• DAN on WIKIPEDIA!

• DAN on IMDB!

• DAN in THE MEDIA!


• BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

• BRETT on INSTAGRAM!

• BRETT on PATREON!

• FTBBW PODCAST MERCHANDISE!

• 'SUPERBOB' - Brett's 2015 feature film!

• 'CORNERBOYS' with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!


• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

• DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
